channel.title: Compiling help! PLEASE!
channel.description:
It keep saying this!
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue. . .
then exiting!!! PLEASE HELP! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 11:53:47 PM[/size][hr]please someone!

item.title: Compiling help! PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @WH1T3_B0W WH1T3 B0W
item.description:
@WH1T3_B0W wrote:

both comments above me wrong, look at the error its giving!

JAVAC IS NOT RECOGNISED!.. when did he say that his compiler didnt work at all, you need to set your vari’s go to the tutorial section and scroll down on god of ikiliki’s thread on how to make a server, itl be there.

i know this becase i trailed the forum looking for a compiler when really it was my Veriabals.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help! PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Edit your compiler and put this:

@echo off COLOR 09 title NigahScape Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help! PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @motoxnick motoxnick
item.description:
@motoxnick wrote:

You need to have the newest version of Java installed to your Computer…

Read full topic
